name: Suites Malecon Cancun
address: Av. Bonampak Sm 6 M1 L1, 77503 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Only 10 minutes’ walk from Boulevard Kukulkan, Suites Malecon Cancun features panoramic views of Cancun city and Nichupté Lagoon. The property is in the same location as Américas Shopping Mall. The apartments are fully equipped and include ironing facilities, satellite channels in a flat-screen TV, safe, and terraces overlooking the lagoon and the city landscape. They are divided into seating area, dining area, well-equipped kitchen, bedroom and private bathroom with shower. Toiletries are provided. Las Américas Shopping Mall features several different restaurants that guests can explore, or they can also choose to prepare their own meals en suite. The complex has an infinity pool with a hot tub, BBQ facilities, plus sun terraces with beds and loungers. The facilities also offer a gym and a business centre. The International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive from the complex and Cancun’s town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa
address: Sm 307 Mz 334 Lt 04 - 02, 77560 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Situated in Cancún, 1.5 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa features accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The property is located 11 km from Beto Avila Stadium, 11 km from Cancun Government Palace and 12 km from Cancun Bus Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with free toiletries, the rooms at Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms have a balcony. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa offers a hot tub. La Isla Shopping Mall is 23 km from the hotel, while Universidad Anahuac Cancun is 3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 6 km from Tsaakik Jungle Hotel & Spa.

name: Grand Sens Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km 4.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: Approx. 50 m from a sandy beach is situated the hotel The Sens Cancun. For mobility there is a taxi rank, a bus stop and a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 32 km away. Amenities: Recently renovated in 2019, the 10-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 559 rooms in total. It is equipped with a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby, a lift, an air conditioning, a shop, discotheque, a theater as well as a parking area (for free). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi can be used by hotel guests for a fee. Room cleaning and concierge service are free of charge. Room service and laundry / ironing service are available for a fee. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Visa and Euro / MasterCard. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

name: Club Regina Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km 20.5, Hotels Area, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located on the beachfront on Kukulkan Boulevard, Rantree’s Club Regina has an outdoor pool, private beach area, and a specialized staff that works to entertain the guests. Parking is possible on site. Rooms feature modern minimalist décor and include a flat-screen TV, telephone, alarm clock and ironing facilities. Some rooms also have a sofa bed. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer, free toiletries and towels. The property has its own restaurant and bar on site. You can also find a good variety of options along Kulkulkan Boulevard. La Isla Shopping Village is 15 minutes’ drive away, while Plaza Caracol Shopping Centre, the Plaza Forum by the Sea and Coco Bongo Club are within a 20-minute drive. Cancun International Airport is 12 km away.

name: Hotel Blue Star Cancun
address: 102 Palenque 26, 77509 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Blue Star Cancun features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, free private parking and room service. Boasting a shared lounge, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room comes with a coffee machine, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Hotel Blue Star Cancun. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Beto Avila Stadium, Cancun Bus Station and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International, 18 km from Hotel Blue Star Cancun, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Cancun Bay Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With breathtaking views of Mujeres Bay, Cancun Bay Resort features a beachfront pool and relaxation pool, tennis courts and a hot tub with a bar. It is located near several of Cancun's restaurants, shops and entertainment venues. Cancun International Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and Cancun's commercial area can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Each room and suite at the resort has a private balcony or terrace with views of the lagoon, garden or sea.FarePortal

name: Akkuun Tulum Adults Only

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Tulum Archeological Site is 8.3 km from Akkuun Tulum - Adults Only, while Parque Nacional Tulum is 1.9 km from the property. name: Diamante K - Inside Tulum National Park

name: Hotel Cabañas Tulum Beach Hotel & Spa
address: Carretera Cancun-Tulum Bocapalia Km 7, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: This hotel is located on one of the nicest beaches in Tulum, Mexico. The hotel offers a secluded location, guest rooms with free WiFi, an on-site restaurant and the Ziggy's Beach Club. Rooms at Cabanas Tulum include hammocks on the private terrace. Some rooms are located directly on the beach. Some rooms feature a private rooftop terrace with hot tub. Fresco's offers international cuisine and has children menu. Hotel guests can enjoy the beach club amenities, as well as cocktails and beers. The bilingual staff at Cabanas Tulum can arrange tours to nearby eco-friendly attractions like Sian Ka'an, a natural biosphere, or tours to sightseeing the cenotes, the natural underground pools, or travel to the archaeological sites nearby including Cobá, Chichen Itza and Ek Balam. Cabanas Tulum has Naj Naay Spa. Our guests minimum age is 14 years.

name: Lula Tulum
address: Km 8.2 Carretera Boca Paila, 77790 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Designed to accommodate, Sanar was created with options for intimate relaxation or social interactions with like minded individuals. In 2017 Sanara Tulum was selected #3 in the 150 Greatest Hotels in the world by Harpers Bazaar. The hotel also won the 2015 National Competition in the category of Architecture and Interiors for Hotels from the Asociacion de Arquitectos e Interioristas, Mexico. A space that harmonizes with the beauty of its surroundings. The sleek and simple architecture is nestled in-between wildly sprouting Coconut Palms and Mayan Cheet trees while the ocean provides ample breeze and the serenading sounds of crashing waves.Lula 19 AC rooms, suites and villas, Wellness Center, and Studio are built on the coveted white sand beaches of Tulum, Mexic. Overlooking the crystal clear turquoise sea, the curative boutique hotel offers both Beachside & Sanara Jungle Poolside rooms. Each Lula beach room offers a private balcony, luxurious bathroom, and wardrobe. Dressed with imported bamboo cotton from Italy, both the super king size and additional day bed make for the ultimate luxury in sleeping, and accommodate up to two or three people.The stunningly appointed Sanara Villa, situated in our beachside garden, has one opulent master suite downstairs with a large living room, and upstairs an additional 2 bedroom suite. The Villa can sleep up to 8 adults. +Our Jungle provides 4 gorgeous jungle rooms nestled around a private pool and waterfall, each with a King bed, air conditioning and private bathroom. In addition we offer a Jungle Villa with 2 Suites, each comprising of 1 spacious bedroom and 1 living room. Our Jungle villa also has a stunning Jungle roof terrace which delivers stunning sunsets over the canopy of trees. Sanara Jungle is very popular with groups and more economic travelers who wish to come and enjoy Sanara's stunning yoga facility, the acclaimed cuisine inside The Real Coconut, and of course the priceless Tulum beach. Our restaurant has become a global hit with people traveling just to eat with us. Created by Daniella Hunter, The Real Coconut's philosophy of eating is a regimen for sustainable living, both personally and for the planet. Built on the foundational belief that plants form the key to our vitality and that gut health and digestion are paramount to optimum well being, The Real Coconut is dedicated to all that is conscious living. Daniella integrates key elements of paleo, gluten & grain-free, and vegan diet practices, ultimately creating a menu that is universal without compromising taste. The Real coconut products are now sold in Whole Foods Markets, Costco and thousands of stores stores across the United States, Canada and EnglandThe menus are gluten free; grain free, dairy free; refined sugar free; soy free; and cashew freeIn a coconut shell.our philosophy is plant based food with options to include sustainably sourced animal proteins.The hotel also features one of the most stunning yoga studios on the planet, where Tulum's finest teachers provide three classes a day. And finally you can encounter "care" and "service" in the Sanara Wellness Center, which has also been consistently listed in top wellness lists in thew world, offering a comprehensive menu to help you take away any stress and support your total rejuvenation.iHotelier/iStay

name: Xscapetulum

description: Offering an outdoor pool, Xscape Tulum is located 1 km from Tulum main square and 5.2 km from Tulum Archeological Site. Free WiFi access is available in all areas. Each room here will provide you with air conditioning and a seating area. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with free toiletries. You can enjoy pool view from the room. The hotel is 1.2 km from Tulum Bus station and 2.9 km from Tulum beaches. Cancún International Airport is about 90 minutes’ drive away.

name: Alquimia Hotel Boutique
address: Carretera Boca Paila Km 7.5, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: Located on the heart of Tulum beach, you can appreciate the breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea from the comfort of our beach cabanas. Our Eco-Chic decor rooms are all the Tulum vibes you need; Suites, Cabanas and Container Rooms have air conditioning, hot and cold water for a great shower, daily cleaning, room service and access to our private Beach Club where you can enjoy our Infinity Pool, Volley ball net, Kayaks, Swings, Beach Bar with great Mixology, delicious Mexican Food, among other amenities. We are a Pet Friendly Hotel, so your best friend is more than welcome. Our fantastic location allows us to be 5 minutes away from all the main attractions, exclusive boutiques, beach clubs, Restaurants and Night life of Tulum’s Hotel Area.

name: Casa Coyote Tulum
address: Km 9.3, Tulum Road Boca Paila, 77780 Tulum, Quintana Roo
description: ECO ROOMS CASA COYOTE They are very cozy rooms ideal for 2 people. 100% PRIVATE ECO, very fresh ambiance with AC, king-size bed, private bathroom, shower, safe, USB connection and clothes rack. Tulum invites couples, yogis and adventurers of nature to enjoy its magical energy. ECO FRENDLY SERVICES: Water extracted from underground channels. We provide free wifi through a router / repeater. We are located in the Mayan jungle, we recommend bringing mosquito lotion. NEARBY PLACES: A 5 minute walk away are the best beach clubs in the area, Hotel Casa Malca by Pablo Escobar, Hotel Nomade and Be Tulum. Spa Yáan Wellness is next to the establishment. Beach club Dos Ceibas, with beautiful family atmosphere. In front of Casa Coyote is located the restaurant Loco Tulum, by the famous Chef Idan Lifshitz. Its prepare breakfast from 9 am, lunch and dinner until 11 pm. If you need any information about cenotes, diving, yoga, parties, nightlife, excursions, trips, etc. the establishment will help you with everything you need. The establishment offers more information. Our clients say that this part of Tulum is their favorite, according to the independent comments. We speak your language!

If you are travelling with kids, you must pay a fee for breakfast directly at the hotel.

The Isis Spa offers a variety of beauty and health treatments. The restaurant is open all year round offering meals throughout the day. The hotel can also arrange tours and activities such as kite boarding, cave diving Cenotes and snorkelling tours.

All rooms (10 in total) have a flat-screen TV (satellite), air conditioning, private bathroom inside the rooms, electricity, 24 hours security and free WiFi. In the surroundings you can practice various activities such as snorkeling, Diving, cycling and fishing. El Paraíso Hotel also has bicycle rental.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Mexico City, Colonia Roma
address: Alvaro Obregon No. 38, Mexico City, Mexico City Federal District
description: Discover business or vacation unlike any other at Four Points by Sheraton Mexico City, Colonia Roma, where enduring classics are interwoven with 21st-century amenities. Whether you want to go on a shopping spree in Condesa, retrace the city's rich history in the historic center of Mexico City or gaze upon some of Mexico's tallest buildings at Paseo de la Reforma, you'll find exactly what your heart desires just moments from our Roma Norte hotel. Once you've worked up an appetite, make your way to Restaurant Sarabela, our on-site restaurant. From breakfast through dinner, it serves a mouthwatering array of Mexican cuisine, paired with handcrafted cocktails and unforgettable views of the city. Retire to the comfort of your room or suite, complete with a pillowtop mattress, flat-panel TV, 24-hour room service and complimentary Wi-Fi. name: Hotel Casa Iguana Mismaloya
address: Avenue 5 De Mayo 455, 48394 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: This Puerto Vallarta hotel features a restaurant and offers a kitchen in every suite. Suites at Casa Iguana All Suites Hotel include a private bathroom and seating area. The suites also have air conditioning and a coffee maker. Room service is available to guests. Casa Iguana offers a restaurant and convenience store. Guests can swim in the outdoor pool. The All Suites Hotel Casa Iguana is within a 5-minute drive to Villa de Guadalupa. The hotel is within 2 miles of the beach. The nearest airport is Puerto Vallarta International Airport just 21 km from the property.

name: Zonaz Boutique Hotel
address: 574 Pino Suárez, 48399 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Situated in Puerto Vallarta and with Los Muertos Beach reachable within 300 metres, ZonaZ Boutique Hotel features concierge services, allergy-free rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and an outdoor swimming pool. This 4-star hotel offers a garden. Every room includes a balcony with views of the city. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At ZonaZ Boutique Hotel rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Puerto Vallarta, like cycling. Amapas Beach is less than 1 km from ZonaZ Boutique Hotel, while Camarones Beach is a 15-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Lic. Gustavo Diaz Ordaz, 11 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites
address: Amapas 114 Col Emiliano Zapata, 48380 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in Emiliano Zapata, Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites is a perfect starting point from which to explore Puerto Vallarta. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like air conditioning, wake-up service, desk, balcony/terrace, telephone. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Emperador Vallarta Beachfront Hotel and Suites is an excellent choice from which to explore Puerto Vallarta or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

name: Hotel Porto Allegro Puerto Vallarta
address: Calle Hidalgo No. 119, 48300 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Located in the center of Puerto Vallarta and 50 meters from Plaza de Armas, Hotel Porto Alegre Puerto Vallarta offers free Wi-Fi and features a roof garden terrace with outdoor minipool and a 24-hour fitness center. The air-conditioned rooms at the Porto Alegre Puerto Vallarta offer flat-screen TV with cable channels. Buffet breakfast is included in the price. Porto Alegre Puerto Vallarta’s bar offers views of the city and Sierra Madre. Isla Cuale can be reached within 5 minutes’ walk. The Centro Romantico with a variety of restaurants and nightclubs is 100 meters from the property. Playa de los Muertos is within 10 minutes’ walk. Puerto Vallarta International Airport is 15 minutes’ drive.

name: Club Regina Puerto Vallarta
address: Paseo De La Marina Sur 205, 48335 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Raintree's Club Regina Puerto Vallarta wraps elegance and tradition around relaxing ocean and marina views. Guests have access to all amenities that the resort has to offer including an on-site restaurant and bar, beautiful accommodation and large swimming pools. Beaches and the rich biodiversity draw tourists from around the globe. The Malecon, one of the most popular locations for tourists, is a flourishing art scene on the south side of Vallarta that is home to art galleries, restaurants and bars. This is a 1 bedroom suite with a full kitchen that sleeps 4. It has a king bed in the master bedroom and the couch folds out into a double bed. Must book Saturday-Saturday. Must book at least 60 days in advance. Must contact before booking reservation.VRBO

name: Hotel del Marquesado
address: Calzada Madero #208, 68000 Oaxaca, Oaxaca
description: Offering an à la carte restaurant serving breakfast, Hotel Posada del Marquesado is located in Oaxaca de Juárez only 6 minutes’ walk from the town centre. Free Wi-Fi access is available. The rooms here feature a Mexican style and will provide you with a flat-screen cable TV and a seating area. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with towels. They also include a fan. Guests will be able to find a variety of restaurants, eateries and snack places at the town centre. Most of them offer Mexican dishes and typical local cuisine. At Hotel Posada del Marquesado you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered include a tour desk and a laundry. The hotel is 1 km from Oaxaca Cathedral, 1 km from the Food and Flea Market and 20 minutes’ drive from Oaxaca International Airport. Monte Alban Archaelogical Site can be reached in 15 minutes by car.

name: Casa De Sierra Azul
address: Hidalgo 1002 Esq Fiallo, 68000 Oaxaca, Oaxaca
description: Located on the historic centre of Oaxaca, this 19th century mansion is only 2 blocks from the main square and the cathedral. Casa De Sierra Azul is considered a patrimony of humanity by UNESCO. This luxury hotel features a typical colonial courtyard with a fountain on the centre of the property. Casa De Sierra Azul preserves its original wooden door and the archways. Each room at the Sierra Azul comes with a colonial décor and a private bathroom with shower. They have a flat-screen TV with cable and free WiFi. Also available are a coffee maker, hairdryer, vanity mirrors, ironing appliances and acoustic doors. Smoking is allowed in the hotels open areas. Corazón Oaxaqueño Restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Snacks and drinks are available every evening at this restaurant. Room service is available. Staff at the 24-hour reception can book city tours or provide other services such as car rental. Main churches and museums are within walking distance, while Monte Albán Archaeological Site is a 15-minute drive.

name: Arcosodi Hotel Boutique
address: 514 C. de Mariano Abasolo Centro, 68000 Oaxaca, Oaxaca
description: Set in Oaxaca City and with Monte Alban reachable within 8.6 km, ArcoSodi Hotel Boutique offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. Located around 44 km from Mitla, the hotel is also 10 km away from Tule Tree. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, room service and organising tours for guests. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the hotel. Speaking English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Popular points of interest near ArcoSodi Hotel Boutique include Oaxaca Cathedral, Santo Domingo Temple and Central Bus Station foreign buses. The nearest airport is Oaxaca International, 8 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Los Amantes
address: Calle Ignacio Allende 108, 68000 Oaxaca, Oaxaca
description: Featuring a terrace, a restaurant as well as a bar, Hotel Los Amantes is located in the centre of Oaxaca City, 8 km from Monte Alban. Located around 45 km from Mitla, the hotel is also 11 km away from Tule Tree. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. A continental breakfast is available daily at the hotel. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel Los Amantes. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Santo Domingo Temple, Oaxaca Cathedral and Central Bus Station foreign buses. The nearest airport is Oaxaca International Airport, 7 km from Hotel Los Amantes.

name: Casa Hidalgo Hotel Boutique
address: Miguel Hidalgo 417 Centro, 68000 Oaxaca, Oaxaca
description: Casa Hidalgo Hotel Boutique features a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Oaxaca City. This 5-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At Casa Hidalgo Hotel Boutique each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Monte Alban is 7 km from the accommodation, while Mitla is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Oaxaca International Airport, 6 km from Casa Hidalgo Hotel Boutique.

name: Hotel Casa Hx - Adults Only
address: Av Pedro Joaquín Coldwell Predio 006, 77310 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: Hotel Casa HX - Adults Only has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Holbox Island. With a restaurant, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk. All rooms include a safety deposit box, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also have sea views. At Hotel Casa HX - Adults Only rooms have bed linen and towels. An American breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. With staff speaking English and Spanish, non-stop information is available at the reception. Punta Coco is 400 metres from Hotel Casa HX - Adults Only, while Playa Holbox is 500 metres from the property.

name: Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only
address: Calle Caguama Esquina Calle Zargo, 73310 Holbox, Quintana Roo
description: Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only has an outdoor swimming pool, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Holbox Island. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Staff on site can arrange airport transfers. At the hotel rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. Each room has a safety deposit box and some rooms include pool views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Holbox Island, like cycling. Playa Holbox is 100 metres from Soho Boutique Holbox - Adults Only, while Punta Coco is 1.1 km from the property.

name: Fiesta Inn Tuxtla Gutierrez
address: Avenida Prolongacion Anillo De Circunvalacion, 29060 Tuxtla Gutiérrez, Chiapas
description: Located in the newly developed business and hotel area, just 5 minutes from the Galeras Boulevard business park and with easy access to the area's tourist attractions, such as the San Marcos Cathedral, the Miguel lvarez Zoo and 45 minutes from the Sumidero Canyon and Chiapa de Corzo. Situated thirty-five minutes from the airport and 10 minutes from the bus station.We remind you that the check-in time is from 3:00 PM. Check-out is at 12:00 PM. We suggest you use our express check-out service.From now on, a 1% City lodging tax is effective in our hotels located in Tuxtla Gutirrez, Chiapas. name: Hotel Real Plaza
address: Av. Venustiano Carranza 890, 78250 San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosí
description: Hotel Real Plaza offers an outdoor pool, free private parking and air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. It is located in central San Luis Potosi, a 10-minute walk from Plaza de Armas Square. Rooms at the Real Plaza have classic-style décor and some offer city views. Each room includes cable TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower and toiletries. The hotel has an à la carte restaurant and an English-style bar. A range of restaurants and fast food outlets can be found within a 5-minute walk. Staff at the Real Plaza’s 24-hour reception can arrange car hire and airport transfers on request. They are also happy to provide information about the colonial city of San Luis Potosi.

name: Hotel Inn Galerias
address: Avenida de la Convencion de 1914 Numero 125, 20280 Aguascalientes, Aguascalientes
description: This family-friendly hotel is set 4 blocks from the centre, 5 minutes’ walk from the San Marcos Convention Centre. It offers a gym, garden and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony. Rooms at Hotel Inn Galerias feature elegant décor, free Wi-Fi and most have views of the Cerro del Muerto Mountains, 10 minutes’ drive away. All have a telephone and private bathroom. The Galerias Restaurant serves breakfast and lunch featuring regional cuisine. Packed lunches can be provided for days out and several bars restaurant and shops are within 5 minutes’ walk. The property has a games room with pool table and offers tourist information. The Expoplaza Shopping Centre is 1 block away and the Monumental Bullring is 700 metres away. The Galerias offers free parking and is 10 minutes’ drive from Aguascalientes Bus Station. Aguascalientes International Airport is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Biohotel Boutique Metepec
address: 5 de Mayo No. 109, 52140 Toluca, Mexico State
description: Situated in the very heart of Metepec, Biohotel Boutique is only a 5 minutes’ walk from Metepec Church and 10 minutes’ drive from Toluca city centre. Rooms at Biohotel Boutique Metepec feature a TV and a private bathroom. Free Wi-Fi is also available. Staff at the 24 hour reception is also happy to provide tourist information about the area. Toluca Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away. You can drive to Mexico City International Airport in 45 minutes.

name: Na Balam Hotel
address: Calle Zazil-ha No. 118, 77400 Isla Mujeres, Quintana Roo
description: Set in a prime location of Cancun, Na Balam puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Na Balam. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as television LCD/plasma screen, separate living room, internet access – wireless, private pool, internet access – wireless (complimentary). Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including spa, garden, water sports (non-motorized), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Discover all Cancun has to offer by making Na Balam your base.Agoda
